text: pratikṣēpa karannangē hṛdayanhi itāmat ikmanin api biya æti vīmaṭa salasvannemu. mandayat ovun samānayan tæbīmaṭa (allāh) kisima sādhakayak ovunṭa labā nodī siṭiyadī ovun allāhṭa samānayan tabannāha. ovun ræen̆dana sthānaya nirayayi. (nirayehida) mema aparādhakaruvan ræen̆dana sthānaya itāmat narakaya
